creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
description: travelers trek up a very steep mountain path lined with grey grasses and gnarled pine trees; one carries an empty palanquin over PL shoulder, while the other carries a green bundle; five other travelers gather near a large rock at the base of the path; layered brown mountain LLQ with blue mountains in distance
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar ULQ; upper center
title: Nissaka, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
